short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Dive into the gripping world of Breaking Bad with intense visuals and seamless shortcuts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Walter White seated on a rugged chair, surrounded by stacks of money in an abandoned warehouse, as a subtle breeze sweeps through the scene, encapsulating the essence of Breaking Bad.

🎨 Minimalist Design: A sleek, gritty interface inspired by the show's intense atmosphere.
⏰ Clock and Date: Keep track of time with a display as precise as Heisenberg's formulas.
🔗 Quick Access Shortcuts: Effortlessly navigate to your favorite sites, streamlined like a perfect cook.
🎮 Play Games: Engage with browser-based mini-games inspired by the strategic brilliance of Walter White.
🔍 Google Search Bar: Quickly perform searches with the engine of your choice.
🚀 More Extension: Enhance your browsing experience with Walter White adventures.
